project_descr: This project will improve implementation of ASDEP through developing the capacity of the staff for efficient and effective identification of the people in need of public services including social assistance and social services.

outputs.output_descr: Effective and efficient service monitoring system of the Ministry of Family and Social Policies (MoFSP) through establishment of the software infrastructure and assessments/service delivery recommendations
